name: Caves of Eria
description:
A small metroidvania made in three weeks for a personal gamejam that I had with my friends, and my first "real" game. 

Explore deep and intertwined  dungeons, and use your elemental powers to beat the challenges and finish the game.

This game is hard, it is not for the faint of heart.

Controls: 

Arrow keys to move

Z (A Button) -> Jump

X (B Button) -> Shoot/Charge (when you get the upgrade)

Shift + Hold Direction -> Change element (when you get the required upgrade.)
